title: Additional development cess equivalent to100%of Development charges on BUA (excluding the fungible compensatory area/BUA), or Rs5,000 per sq
clause_text: Additional development cess equivalent to100%of Development charges on BUA (excluding the fungible compensatory area/BUA), or Rs5,000 per sq. m whichever is more for BUA over and above the existing BUA shall be paid by the owner/developer/society, for the rehabilitation and free sale components. This amount shall be paid to the Corporation in accordance with the time schedule for such payment as may be laid down by the Commissioner, MCGM provided the payment of installments shall not go beyond the completion of construction. This amount shall be used for Scheme to be prepared for the improvement of off-site infrastructure in the area around the development. Development cess shall be in addition to development charges levied as per section 124 of MR&TP Act 1966.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
